DOC.brief_summary: In a large prospective cross-sectional study, the investigators aimed to identify the determinants of thyroid surgery outcomes and quantify the relative influence of preoperative and intraoperative factors. For this purpose, the investigators considered the interplay of several characteristics specific to surgeons, patients, and surgical procedures.
DOC.criteria: All patients who underwent a thyroid procedure between April 2008 and July 2008. Participation refusal
